name: Clipyoo
tag_list: video, stock, footage, professional, hd, high-definition, tv, television, video-clip, documentary, royalty-free, production, audiovisual
overview:
CLIPYOO offers a huge portfolio of 10 seconds professional high-definition stock video footage, which can be used without licensing restrictions by professionals or amateurs in films, TV, documentaries, ads, corporate communication, educational, and family videos in a very simple manner: find the clip, pay a one-time royalty fee, download it instantly, and use it freely.

CLIPYOO get all this footage through professional crowdsourcing. Content owners can monetize their stock footage by uploading it to CLIPYOO, and they can earn a commission each time one of their clips is downloaded
